page.title: 07SATURDAY AFTERNOON IN HESSLE
page.content: {1 p.m.}Father joins friends for a drink;mother,Megan(12),Gareth(9) and a friend go to Costello Stadium to watch the National Schools Athletic Championships. Eat packed lunch of ham rolls, crisps, orange juice. {3 p.m.}Father home - watches sport on T.V. At {5.20 p.m.} family returns home and prepares for tea. {6.30 p.m. }Megan watches T.V. pop group marathon "Live Aid" (fund-raising concert for starving children in Ethiopia). {7 p.m. }Mother starts some washing and later {at 8.30 p.m.}continues knitting a cotton jumper. {9.45 p.m. }Gareth goes to bed. Megan and mother discuss the large number of coloured athletes at the Sports Meeting. {11 p.m.}Megan goes to bed. {12.30 a.m.}Mother and father go to bed
